review: Everything I wanted out of it.
author: Jason Kerns

review: i love love love this thing!!! so easy to install, no more hooking my laptop up to the tv to watch netflix!
author: kimmy

review: Love FIRE TV!! Have the box in our bedroom and the stick in the living room. Amazing service, very intuitive and user friendly. Can't imagine life without it now!! Cancelled cable TV as a result!!
author: Todd Lavine

review: So far I love it.  The only downfall is that I am unable to stream from my apple device to it.
author: Jasmine Cuevas

review: We don't get high speed internet not available here so its a pain waiting to buffer
author: georgia dittemore

review: Love it. Great way to use my streaming plans. It was so simple to set up and I was enjoying it a few minutes later. My biggest gripe is the remote was so hard to open I think I almost lost a finger. I actually had to YouTube how to open it. Not going back to cable--yippee!! Get it you will love it.
author: A. Gill "Tacoma Mom"
